summary: Schmitke is an old German wind turbine engineer. One day, he is dispatched to the Czech side of the Ore Mountains to fix an old squeaking wind turbine. His colleague disappears and mysterious things begin to happen in the forest.
cast: Peter Kurth|Johann Jürgens|Helena Dvoráková|Jakub Zácek|Petr Vrsek|Lana Cooper|Stephan Grossmann|Johanka Schmidtmajerová|Irena Lamberková|Vladimír Skultéty|Andrea Christina Furrer
title: Schmitke
